hero.title: Master Your
hero.subtitle: Table Tennis
hero.description: Join Club Esportiu Joventut and unleash your potential. From beginners to champions, we train them all.

about.title: Who We Are
about.description: Founded in 1995, Club Esportiu Joventut has been the premier destination for table tennis enthusiasts in our community. We believe in fostering excellence, sportsmanship, and lifelong friendships through the beautiful game of table tennis.
about.excellenceDesc: Striving for the highest standards in training and competition
about.communityDesc: Building lasting friendships and supporting each other
about.storyP1: Club Esportiu Joventut was born from a simple vision: to create a space where table tennis enthusiasts of all levels could come together, learn, and grow. What started as a small group of passionate players in 1995 has evolved into one of the region's most respected table tennis institutions.
about.storyP2: Our founders, former national champions Sarah and Michael Chen, believed that table tennis was more than just a sportâ€”it was a way to build character, discipline, and lifelong friendships. This philosophy continues to guide us today.
about.storyP3: Over the years, we've produced numerous regional and national champions, but we're equally proud of the recreational players who've found joy, fitness, and community within our walls.
about.valuesDesc: These core principles guide everything we do at Club Esportiu Joventut

trainings.title: Training Programs
trainings.description: Discover the perfect training program for your skill level and goals. From beginners to champions, we have something for everyone.
trainings.mainProgramsDesc: Choose the program that matches your skill level and commitment
trainings.beginnerDesc: Perfect for newcomers to table tennis. Learn basic techniques, rules, and develop fundamental skills.
trainings.competitionDesc: Advanced training for competitive players. Focus on strategy, advanced techniques, and tournament preparation.
trainings.adultsDesc: Flexible training sessions designed for working adults. Improve fitness while learning table tennis skills.
trainings.specialProgramsDesc: Additional training options for specific needs
trainings.youthDesc: Specialized program for young talents aged 8-16

teams.title: Competition & Results
teams.description: Follow our teams' journey through leagues and tournaments
teams.teamRosterDesc: Our competitive teams across different divisions

news.title: News & Events
news.description: Stay updated with the latest news, events, and achievements from our club

gallery.title: Media Gallery
gallery.description: Capture the excitement and energy of our club through photos and videos

join.title: Ready to Join Our Family?
join.description: Become part of Club Esportiu Joventut and experience the thrill of table tennis in a supportive, competitive environment. Your journey to excellence starts here.
join.choosePlanDesc: Select the membership that matches your commitment and goals
join.applicationDesc: Fill out the form below to join Club Esportiu Joventut
join.agreeTerms: I agree to the Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy of Club Esportiu Joventut.
join.agreeNewsletter: I would like to receive newsletters and updates about club events and activities.
join.reviewMessage: We'll review your application and contact you within 24 hours.
join.whyJoinDesc: Experience the benefits of being part of our community
join.expertCoachingDesc: Learn from certified coaches with years of competitive experience and proven training methods.
join.modernFacilitiesDesc: Train in our state-of-the-art facility with professional equipment and optimal playing conditions.
join.competitiveOpportunitiesDesc: Participate in tournaments, leagues, and competitions to test your skills and achieve your goals.
join.joinCommunityDesc: Connect with passionate players and lifelong friends
join.competeWinDesc: Participate in tournaments and achieve your goals
join.loveGameDesc: Develop your passion for table tennis with expert guidance
join.specialOffer: Special offer: First month free for new members!

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Sign in to your Club Esportiu Joventut account to access your dashboard, track progress, and connect with the community.
login.signInDesc: Enter your credentials to access your account
login.onceLoggedIn: Once logged in, you'll have access to:
login.progressTrackingDesc: Monitor your XP, level, and training statistics
login.achievementsDesc: Unlock badges and track your accomplishments
login.sessionLoggingDesc: Log training sessions and track your progress

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Ready to start your table tennis journey? Contact us today!
contact.subject: Subject

footer.description: Club Esportiu Joventut has been the premier destination for table tennis excellence since 1995.
